name.baseName: 金属加工机械| 中国环境扩展投入产出（CEEIO）数据库 | 2018

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: CEEIO is the result of near decade-long research of using environmentally extended input-output models studying China's environmental issues led by Prof. Ming Xu at the Tsinghua University in collaboration with Prof. Sai Liang at Guangdong University of Technology and Prof. Xi Tian at Nanchang University.CEEIO consists of benchmark economic input-output tables published by the Chinese government statistics agency and environmental satellite accounts compiled from multiple sources. Technical details such as data sources, compilation methods, and assumptions are available as Technical Notes included in the downloadable files.The development of CEEIO was partially supported by the Kenneth G. Lieberthal and Richard H. Rogel Center for Chinese Studies at the Tsinghua University.
CEEIO 是清华大学徐明教授与广东工业大学梁赛教授和南昌大学田曦教授合作，利用环境扩展投入产出模型研究中国环境问题的近十年研究成果。CEEIO 由中国政府统计机构发布的基准经济投入产出表和从多个来源编制的环境卫星账户组成。CEEIO 的开发得到了清华大学 Kenneth G. Lieberthal 和 Richard H. Rogel 中国研究中心的部分支持。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 产出10000元的金属加工机械

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 根据现有数据，CEEIO数据集考虑了中国各个部门和家庭产生的四大类中44种环境压力： (1) 淡水消耗；(2) 23 种大气污染物，包括二氧化碳（CO2）、甲烷（CH4）、一氧化二氮（N2O）、氮氧化物（NOx）、粉尘和烟尘、二氧化硫（SO2）、有害微量元素（HTEs，包括汞、砷、硒、铅、镉、铬、镍、锑、锰、钴、铜和锌）、空气动力学直径为 2. 5毫米或以下的颗粒物（PM2.5）、空气动力直径为10毫米或以下的颗粒物（PM10）、一氧化碳（CO）、挥发性有机化合物（VOC）、氨（NH3）； (3) 13 种水污染物，包括化学需氧量、氨氮化合物、磷、石油污染物、挥发性酚、氰化物、水生汞、水生镉、水生铬、水生铅、水生砷、水生铜和水生锌；以及 (4) 7 种固体废物，包括工业固体废物、塑料薄膜、农作物秸秆、动物粪便、污泥、医疗废物和生活垃圾。根据现有数据，2018 年 CEEIO 数据库涵盖了这 44 种环境压力中的 28 种：(1) 各行业燃料燃烧量；(2) 工业产品产量；(3) 农作物产量；(4) 牲畜和家禽数量；(5) 农业、工业和生活淡水消耗量；(6) 塑料薄膜使用量。

the datasets consider four broad categories, 44 types of environmental pressures generated by domestic sectors and households in China based on the available data: (1) freshwater consumption; (2) 23 types of atmospheric pollutants including carbon dioxide (CO2), methane (CH4), nitrous oxide (N2O), nitrogen oxides (NOx), dust and soot, sulfur dioxide (SO2), hazardous trace elements (HTEs, including Hg, As, Se, Pb, Cd, Cr, Ni, Sb, Mn, Co, Cu, and Zn), particulate matter with an aerodynamic diameter of 2.5 mm or less (PM2.5), particulate matter with an aerodynamic diameter of 10 mm or less (PM10), carbon monoxide (CO), Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), ammonia (NH3); (3) 13 types of water pollutants including chemical oxygen demand, ammonia nitrogen compounds, phosphorus, petroleum pollutants, volatile phenols, cyanide, aquatic Hg, aquatic Cd, aquatic Cr, aquatic Pb, aquatic As, aquatic Cu, and aquatic Zn; and (4) 7 types of solid waste including industrial solid waste, plastic film, crop straws, animal manure, sludge, medical waste, and household waste. The 2018 CEEIO database covers 28 types of environmental pressures among these 44 based on the available data: (1) the fuel combustion from sectors, (2) the output of industrial products, (3) the yield of crop, (4) the amount of livestock and poultry, (5) the freshwater consumption for agriculture, industry, and domestic use, and (6) the usage amount of plastic film.
technology.technologicalApplicability: 2018年CEEIO模型所描述的金属加工机械过程用于创建涉及金属制造、成形或操作的机械。这些机械是制造业的关键组成部分，用于包括切割、焊接、成型、组装和金属部件及结构的精加工等一系列操作。从CEEIO得到的数据通过提供中国金属加工过程环境影响的洞见，来指导可持续的制造实践。这包括理解诸如淡水、能源需求以及排放和废物产生等资源消耗。生命周期评估数据可以帮助制造商在制造金属加工机械时，做出决策以提高效率、降低环境影响并遵守法规。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Emissions Data Coverage:The 2018 China Environmentally Extended Input-Output (CEEIO) database includes emissions from combustion of 26 fuel types and emissions from various industrial processes for 19 air pollutants such as CO2, CH4, and NOx. Industrial Processes Inclusion:Emissions from the production of a wide range of products including crude petroleum, vegetable oil, paper, and several chemicals are accounted for. Historical Emissions Adjustment：For pollutants with last available data from 2015, estimations for 14325 are made by applying sector-specific price indices and adjusting with comprehensive emissions data from authoritative national sources.

排放数据覆盖范围：2018年中国环境投入产出扩展（CEEIO）数据库包括26种燃料燃烧产生的排放，以及各种工业生产过程中产生的二氧化碳、甲烷和氮氧化物等19种大气污染物的排放。 工业过程包括：包括原油、植物油、纸张和几种化学品在内的多种产品的生产过程中产生的排放。 历史排放量调整：对于最后可用数据来自 2015 年的污染物，2018 年的估算是通过应用特定行业的价格指数，并根据国家权威来源的综合排放量数据进行调整得出的。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Emissions Calculation Approach: The discharge of air pollutants is determined by combining emission factors for fuel combustion and industrial processing, with data derived from international and national environmental agencies and studies. Particulate Matter Accounting: The capture of PM2.5 and PM10 is considered, integrating removal rates from both fuel combustion and industrial processing into the assessment. Solid Waste and Emissions Estimation Approach：Predictions for sludge and medical waste are formulated by correlating the output of relevant services with their waste intensities, complemented by demographic data for household waste projections. Agricultural Waste Calculations：The quantification of waste from plastic film, crop straw, and livestock manure involves applying usage rates and waste generation metrics to agricultural yield and livestock numbers. Sector Classification Harmonization：Transformations of sector classifications ensure data compatibility across different standards, with binary matrices illustrating the relationship between the sectors in the current and previous databases. Unit：Currency unit was adjusted from "10,000 RMB" to "1 RMB".Weight unit was changed from "ton" to "kg".

历史排放量调整：对于最后可用数据来自 2015 年的污染物，2017 年的估算是通过应用特定行业的价格指数，并根据国家权威来源的综合排放量数据进行调整得出的。 淡水消耗量估算：各行业的淡水使用量是通过将该行业的产出与其供水比例联系起来得出的，并将总量与报告的国家消耗量数字保持一致。 固体废物和排放估算方法：通过将相关服务部门的产出与其废物强度相关联，并辅以家庭废物预测的人口数据，得出污泥和医疗废物的预测结果。 农业废弃物计算：塑料薄膜、农作物秸秆和牲畜粪便废弃物的量化涉及将使用率和废弃物产生指标应用于农业产量和牲畜数量。 部门分类统一：部门分类的转换确保了不同标准之间的数据兼容性，二进制矩阵说明了当前数据库和以前数据库中部门之间的关系。 单位：货币单位由 "10000 元 "调整为 "1 元"，重量单位由 "吨 "调整为 "公斤"。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tian, X.; Liu, Y.-W.; Xu, M.; Liang, S.; Liu, Y.-B. Chinese Environmentally Extended Input-Output Database for 2017 and 2018. Scientific Data 2021, 8, 256

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When working with the 2018 China Environmental Expanded Input-Output (CEEIO) dataset, users need to be aware of several key unit adjustments and data ranges. The unit of economic value has been changed from "10,000 RMB" to "1 RMB", and in line with the ILCD's need for standardized units, values have been normalized to the unit of "EUR" based on the exchange rate of RMB:EUR = 7.5:1, while the unit of mass has been changed from "tons" to "EUR", and the unit of mass has been changed from "tons" to "EUR". EUR" according to the standardized unit requirement of ILCD, and the unit of mass is adjusted from "ton" to "kilogram". The dataset covers 28 out of 44 environmental pressure types, so it is important to be aware of which environmental categories are included and possible omissions when using the dataset. In order to better understand and apply the data, it is recommended that users carefully read the data source documents accompanying the dataset to understand their methodology and assumptions. In addition, it is recommended that the data be integrated in a systematic way into broader environmental analyses or decision-making processes to ensure accuracy and consistency of analysis.

在使用2018年中国环境扩展投入产出（CEEIO）数据集时，用户需注意几项关键的单位调整和数据范围。经济值单位已由“10,000人民币”更改为“1人民币”，并根据ILCD的标准化单位需求，根据人民币：欧元=7.5:1的汇率，将数值归一化为”欧元EUR“单位，而质量单位则从“吨”调整为“千克”。该数据集覆盖了44种环境压力类型中的28种，因此在使用时需注意哪些环境类别被包含及可能的遗漏。为了更好地理解和应用这些数据，建议用户细致阅读随数据集的数据来源文件，了解其编制方法和假设。此外，建议将这些数据以系统化的方式融入更广泛的环境分析或决策过程，以确保分析的准确性和一致性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
